ccsds

Class CcsdsPkt

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccsds.CcsdsPkt
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CcsdsCmdPkt, CcsdsTlmPkt

    public class CcsdsPkt
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for implementing CCSDS command and telemetry packets. It provides constants, types, and methods that are common to all packets. The packet is represented by
    Author:
    David McComas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected byte[] byteArray
      Byte array representation of CCSDS packet
      static int CCSDS_IDX_LENGTH
      Byte array index of packet length
      static int CCSDS_IDX_SEQ_COUNT
      Byte array index of packet sequence count
      static int CCSDS_IDX_STREAM_ID
      Byte array index of Stream ID
      protected static int CCSDS_LENGTH_ADJUST
      CCSDS standard length computation adjustment
      static int CCSDS_MSK_MSG_ID
      Bit mask to retrieve CFS message ID
      static int CCSDS_MSK_SEQ_CNT
      Bit mask to retrieve sequence count field
      static int CCSDS_PRI_HDR_LENGTH
      Length in bytes of the primary header

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getByteArray()
      Return a byte array containing the packet.
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getByteBuffer()
      Return a ByteBuffer containing the CCSDS packet
      int getLength()
      Returns the packet's CCSDS defined length.
      int getSeqCount()
      Returns the packet's sequence count.
      int getStreamId()
      Returns the packet's Stream ID.
      int getTotalLength()
      Returns the total byte length of the packet and not the CCSDS defined length.
      void InitPkt(int streamId, int length)
      Zero fill a packet except for the Stream ID and length in the header.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcsdsPkt

        public CcsdsPkt(int length)
        Constructor that allocates storage for the packet. The packet is zero filled except for the length in the header.
        Parameters:
        length - total number of bytes in the packet including the header

      • CcsdsPkt

        public CcsdsPkt(int streamId,
        int length)
        Constructor that allocates storage for the packet. The packet is zero filled except for the Stream ID and length in the header.
        Parameters:
        steamId - CCSDS Stream ID
        length - total number of bytes in the packet including the header
